title: Harvey's Ideas Megathread
content: This is where I post all of my ideas so far![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] [img]http://images.ucomics.com/comics/ga/2005/ga050705.gif[/img]

title: Re: Harvey's Ideas Megathread
content:
Ideas are all very well, but I don't see the point of coming up with them if you don't have the skills to actually realise them. Instead of wasting time and space coming up with ideas that many people have had before (the Keen community has been around for a long time) why not try to learn how to mod and code?

Remember that ideas aren't exclusive to you. I could sit here and roll off a list of ideas all day, but they're no use to anyone if I don't make them happen. People aren't going to put work into an idea just because you suggested it.

If you don't know where to begin, we can walk you through the basics of all these things and help you to learn. A person who can think is no use if they can't act upon their thoughts.
My [url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?grafix5000]MindBending Power[/url] is 5.43 points.
Possibly the [url=http://legion.gibbering.net/misterx/troutwar.php?s=grafix5000]funniest thing[/url] on the interweb.
Go to [url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url] to see my site!

[img]http://www.toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Idea: Keen pinball!
content: This might be a bad idea [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img]  but can someone make a Keen style pinball game?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] [img]http://images.ucomics.com/comics/ga/2005/ga050705.gif[/img]

title: Re: Idea: Keen pinball!
content:
Agree with grafix5000. People want to do their own ideas and stuff, at least I. Community projects are different thing, but generally people don't want to start some other project suggested by someone else. As grafix said, the ideas are good to have but there's no point if you don't do more than just make up them. Everyone else has ideas as well.

Keen pinball would be fun, but I doubt anyone will make one for a looong time.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

You really should think out your ideas before you throw them out there. What advantage would a huge Keen sprite provide?-----

content:
Someone might have came up with this but we should make Keen jokes!

I.E.: Why did the bounder go out of boundaries? He wanted to be the world's best jumper! *shields himself from oncoming tomatoes* (I know I'm bad at making up those types of jokes... It's because I have a sense of humor that works best when it's drawn. My comics are rated G but they are okay for all ages to read![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] )A proud member of the beta testing society

Something like this would be nice and unobtrusive.

title: hehe
content:
Yes, please do think before you post. Also, I'm not sure if you noticed them, but there are [url=http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/board.html]Posting Guidelines[/url] for this message board. In particular, pay attention to rules 9 and 10:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Please do not:

9. Use a message signature containing multiple images or excessive HTML effects.
10. Flood the board with unwelcome posts. [hr][/quote]
You've already fixed your big signature problem, but only because a few of us asked you multiple times about it. :-)
[quote]Quote:[hr]Administrators and moderators have the right and duty to close or delete messages violating these rules.[hr][/quote]
That's why your topic was closed. The long story short is that you're posting too much! There's only about 20 of us here at all--maybe you're used to larger message boards which have many more members... the Commander Keen community usually only gets around 10 posts per day. If you come in and post 30 all by yourself, people are going to be a little annoyed. :-)

Slow down and read what's already around, maybe download some programs from Spatang.com and try them for yourself. You've mentioned before that you were too lazy to try out your Game Maker... why not put some time in and learn how to do it? Show us all how YOU imagine the next Commander Keen game to be.

In the past, some of the newer members were put on a post limit--where they could only make 8 posts per day, period. Think about what that means... try to pace yourself in that same way. Don't use a whole post just to say "Okay!" and put a smile face... instead, use the post to form a complete thought. Slow down. :-) And welcome to the community.


[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/posted-pics/XkyRauhKeenLogo.png[/img]

title: Re: IDEA: DarkBasic Keen
content:
Ok, stop the flooding then.
I'm getting annoyed. This kind of ideas aren't useful at all. As well, don't post everything you think, like "That means I will have to think before I post a topic..." Besides, I've mentioned about that already. We don't want to see that stuff.
I'm not against posting sometimes something comment like that sometimes, or couple of posts that aren't very useful; I've done so myself as have others, but constant flood of that kind of stuff starts to annoy.
Topic locked.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!
